data.subject: Leaving On A Jet Plane (Live)
data.lyric:
All my bags are packed, I'm ready to go, I'm standing here outside your door
 I hate to wake you up

data.subject: Saturday Night In Toledo, Ohio (Live)
data.lyric:
Saturday night in Toledo, Ohio is like being nowhere at all
 All through the day how the hours rush

data.subject: ReaDJustment Blues (Live)
data.lyric:
Just out of the infantry this morning, I had to pay my dues across the sea
 No one back in boot camp

data.subject: Carolina In My Mind (Live)
data.lyric:
In my mind I'm going to Carolina Can't you see the sunshine
 can't you just feel the moon shining
 A

data.subject: Starwood In Aspen (Live)
data.lyric:
It's a long way from LA to Denver, it's a long time to hang in the sky
 It's a long way home to Star

data.subject: Take Me Home, Country Roads (Re-Recorded) (드라마 `응답하라 1994`)
data.lyric:
Almost heaven, West Virginia
 Blue Ridge Mountains
 Shenandoah River
 Life is old there
 Older than
